author: Benjamin Merot
description:
Module to manage a network interface script and manage routing of IP failover on OVH servers.
Meant to run on RedHat based systems.
Management of OVH IP failover (with routing accross multiple datacenters) is handled via an init script.
The script is compatible with cluster resource managers such as rgmanager or Pacemaker to offer a complete HA stack by nesting it under a VIP resource.
name: tuxomatic-ovhipfailover
summary: OVH IP failover managing Puppet module
